limitedDeposit.title: Error
limitedDeposit.description: Sorry, but you can't deposit for now. Please, contact our support team for more information.

depositSuccess.title: Success
depositSuccess.description: Your {sum} deposit made on {date} is successful!

invalidResetCode.title: Error
invalidResetCode.description: Sorry, but your password reset link is not valid. Please request another password reset.

resentVerification.title: Success
resentVerification.description: We have sent an email with the verification link to your email address.

depositError.title: Error
depositError.description: Sorry, but something went wrong with your {sum} deposit from {date}. Please try again.

limitedRealGame.title: Error
limitedRealGame.description: Sorry, but you can't play in real mode for now. Please, contact our support team for more information.

sentResetLink.title: Success
sentResetLink.description: A password reset link was sent. Click the link in the email to create a new password.

userCanceledWithdrawal.title: Success
userCanceledWithdrawal.description: You have successfully canceled your withdrawal.

withdrawalProcessed.title: Pending!
withdrawalProcessed.description: Your withdrawal is being processed. We will check your request in a short while.

passwordChanged.title: Success
passwordChanged.description: You have successfully changed your password.

withdrawError.title: Canceled withdrawal
withdrawError.description: Your {sum} withdrawal from {date} is being canceled. Please, contact our Support Team for more information.

accountBlocked.title: Error
accountBlocked.description: Sorry, but your account is blocked. Please, contact our support team for more information.
